ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... is ... Yeah. I think people are just a little touchy bc we used to get so much spam from people trying to scam others out of their accounts. I made it a
ygData.messageBody:
> Here we go again, insulting people who ask for help. Maybe she honestly
> didn't know that all of the CD keys were different, but it is assumed that
> she is trying to scam people out of their accounts. Give her credit! This
is
> why I left the group the first time, because people assumed the worst and
> instead of explaining things NICELY.
>
Yeah. I think people are just a little touchy bc we used to get so much spam
from people trying to scam others out of their accounts. I made it a rule
that no selling of accounts is to go on here. People were perceiving it as
SPAM. So they reacted badly.
>
> First off, the CD keys are all different. I don't know who told you they
> were the same or why.
> Second off, old accounts can NOT be reactivated just like that. EverQuest
> holds onto your unused and unpaid for accounts for six months before
> deleting it.
>
Yeah, you can expect that if you reactivate, your characters may still exist
and have the same levels but they may be missing all their gear and items.
And it might take a bit of calling customer service to get a reactivation.
luv,
-Su
